parts.html:
København, Danmark – 25. april 2025

Nordic Storm, Danmarks nye førende amerikanske fodboldhold, kan med stolthed annoncere udnævnelsen af Stephen Schueler som medejer og bestyrelsesmedlem. Schueler bringer et væld af international ledererfaring og et enormt engagement i at fremme amerikansk-danske relationer.

I skrivende stund fungerer han som Administrerende Direktør for Enerjen Capital, et markedsførende selskab inden for vedvarende energi med speciale i den maritime sektor. Schueler har tidligere haft ledende roller som Chief Commercial Officer hos A.P. Møller-Maersk Group, som Corporate Vice President hos Microsoft Corporation og brugt over to årtier hos Procter & Gamble med ansvaret for globale detailvirksomheder.

Ud over sine erhvervsmæssige udmærkelser er Schueler præsident for The American Club i Danmark, en organisation dedikeret til at styrke kulturelle og forretningsmæssige bånd mellem USA og Danmark. Hans specielle forhold til Danmark understreges yderligere ved sin oldefar, Dr. Michael Cramer, der tjente som USA's ambassadør i Danmark fra 1870 til 1881 og i Schweiz fra 1881 til 1885. Dr. Cramer var oprindeligt fra Ohio, og hans diplomatiske arbejde lagde grundlaget for Schuelers langvarige forpligtelse til den amerikanske og danske relation. Mere information kan findes på The American Club.

"Jeg er beæret over at slutte mig til Nordic Storm og bidrage til udviklingen af amerikansk fodbold i Danmark," siger Schueler. "Denne mulighed kombinerer min passion for sport, lederskab og min stærke personlige forbindelse til Danmark. " Jeg er spændt over at være med til at bygge noget helt særligt med Nordic Storm."

Nordic Storm spiller sin første kamp d. 18. maj i Schweiz og deres længe ventede første hjemmekamp i København den 1. juni på Gladsaxe Stadion. Schuelers strategiske indsigt og internationale erfaring forventes at spille en nøglerolle, efterhånden som holdet etablerer sig på den største europæiske scene.

"Vi er enormt glade for at kunne byde Stephen velkommen til Nordic Storm-familien," udtaler Lars Green, medstifter af Nordic Storm. "Hans lederskab, globale netværk og personlige dedikation til Danmark er præcis hvad vi har brug for, når vi tager det første skridt i European League of Football. "Det at have en profil af Stephens kaliber om bord er en game-changer for vores organisation og vores fans."

Om Nordic Storm

Nordic Storm er Danmarks nyeste professionelle amerikanske fodboldhold, der konkurrerer i European League of Football (ELF). Med en dedikation til sportslig succes, samfundsengagement og internationale relationer og samarbejder sigter Nordic Storm efter at inspirere en ny generation af amerikanske fodboldfans - både i Danmark og uden for landets grænser.

Billetter til Nordic Storms kampe kan findes på Ticketmaster: Nordic Storm Tickets

For Sponsor- og Investeringsmuligheder venligst kontakt mp@nordicstorm.net
parts.htmlEn:
Copenhagen, Denmark – April 25, 2025

Nordic Storm, Denmark’s new premier American football team, proudly announces the appointment of Stephen Schueler as co-owner and board member. Schueler brings a wealth of international leadership experience and a deep commitment to fostering U.S.-Danish relations.

Currently serving as the Chief Executive Officer of Enerjen Capital, a leading renewable clean energy company specializing in the maritime sector, Schueler has previously held executive roles as Chief Commercial Officer at A.P. Moller-Maersk Group, Corporate Vice President at Microsoft Corporation, and spent over two decades at Procter & Gamble leading global retail operations.

Beyond his corporate achievements, Schueler is the President of The American Club in Denmark, an organization dedicated to strengthening cultural and business ties between the United States and Denmark. His connection to Denmark is further underscored by his great-grandfather, Dr. Michael Cramer, who served as the U.S. Ambassador to Denmark from 1870 to 1881 and to Switzerland from 1881 to 1885. Dr. Cramer was originally from Ohio, and his diplomatic service laid the foundation for Schueler's enduring commitment to U.S.-Danish relations. For more information visit The American Club.

"I'm honored to join Nordic Storm and contribute to the growth of American football in Denmark," said Schueler. "This opportunity combines my passion for sports, leadership, and my strong personal connection to Denmark. I’m excited to help build something truly special with the Nordic Storm."

Nordic Storm is set to play its first game on May 18th in Switzerland, with its highly anticipated first home game in Copenhagen on June 1st at Gladsaxe Stadium. Schueler's strategic insight and international experience are expected to play a key role as the team establishes itself on the biggest European stage.

"We are thrilled to welcome Stephen to the Nordic Storm family," said Lars Green, Co-Founder of Nordic Storm. "His leadership, global network, and personal dedication to Denmark are exactly what we need as we take our first steps into the European League of Football. Having someone of Stephen’s caliber onboard is a game-changer for our organization and our fans."

About Nordic Storm

Nordic Storm is the newest professional American football team in Denmark, competing in the European League of Football (ELF). With a commitment to athletic excellence, community engagement, and international collaboration, Nordic Storm aims to inspire a new generation of American football fans in Denmark and beyond.

Nordic Storm Game Tickets can be purchased at Ticketmaster: Nordic Storm Tickets

For Sponsor and Investment opportunities please inquire at mp@nordicstorm.net

parts.htmlEn: Nordic Storm continues to build an impressive roster for their debut European League of Football (ELF) season, bringing in three exceptional talents: Kenneth Larsen, Alexander Kennedy Chaanhing, and Marcus Boesen. Each player brings a unique skill set and story to the team, further solidifying Nordic Storm as one of the most exciting franchises in the ELF.
parts.html: Nordic Storm fortsætter med at opbygge et imponerende hold til deres debut i European League of Football (ELF) og har sikret sig tre stærke profiler: Kenneth Larsen, Alexander Kennedy Chaanhing og Marcus Boesen. Hver spiller bidrager med unikke kompetencer og erfaringer, som styrker holdets ambitioner om at gøre sig bemærket i ELF.

parts.imageTextEn: Kenneth Larsen, Alexander Kennedy Chaanhing, and Marcus Boesen
parts.imageText: Kenneth Larsen, Alexander Kennedy Chaanhing og Marcus Boesen

parts.htmlEn:
Kenneth Larsen: A Proven Champion Returns Home

The 27-year-old Larsen is a four-time Danish champion with the Copenhagen Towers and brings a wealth of experience to Nordic Storm’s backfield. Having played in Denmark, the USA, and Austria with the Graz Giants, Larsen is no stranger to high-level competition.

"I’m thrilled to be part of Nordic Storm’s debut in the ELF," Larsen said. "This team is going to show what Scandinavian football is all about."

Alexander Kennedy Chaanhing: Swedish Versatility and Talent

At just 20 years old, Alexander Kennedy Chaanhing is already making waves as one of Sweden’s top prospects. A standout running back and linebacker, Chaanhing has represented Sweden at both the senior and youth national levels. Known for his athleticism and versatility, he’s expected to contribute on offense, defense, and special teams.

"This is an amazing opportunity to grow as a player and represent the region at the highest level," Chaanhing shared.

Marcus Boesen: Strength Meets Passion

Now 24 years old, Marcus Boesen is a former European powerlifting champion and an accomplished football player. Boesen’s physicality and determination make him a standout addition to Nordic Storm’s roster. After honing his skills in the USA, he’s excited to return to Scandinavia.

"I still have a hard time wrapping my head around what kind of opportunity this is," Boesen said. "It’s one thing to join such a professional and ambitious team, but playing that first game in our backyard? Oh, you better get your popcorn ready!"
parts.html:
Kenneth Larsen: En Mester Vendt Hjem

27-årige Kenneth Larsen er fire gange dansk mester med Copenhagen Towers og bringer masser af erfaring til Nordic Storms bagkæde. Med spilletid i Danmark, USA og Østrig hos Graz Giants har Larsen prøvet kræfter med konkurrence på højeste niveau.

"Jeg er begejstret for at være en del af Nordic Storms debut i ELF," siger Larsen. "Dette hold skal vise, hvad skandinavisk football virkelig handler om."

Alexander Kennedy Chaanhing: Alsidig Svensk Talent

På blot 22 år gammel er Alexander Kennedy Chaanhing allerede en af Sveriges mest lovende talenter. Som både running back og linebacker har han repræsenteret Sverige på både senior- og ungdomslandsholdene. Kendt for sin atletiske formåen og alsidighed forventes han at bidrage på både offense, defense og special teams.

"Det her er en fantastisk mulighed for at udvikle mig som spiller og repræsentere regionen på højeste niveau," fortæller Chaanhing.

Marcus Boesen: Styrke og Passion

24-årige Marcus Boesen er tidligere europamester i styrkeløft og en dedikeret footballspiller. Boesens fysik og beslutsomhed gør ham til en markant tilføjelse til Nordic Storms trup. Efter at have udviklet sine færdigheder i USA er han klar til at vende tilbage til Skandinavien.

"Jeg har stadig svært ved at forstå, hvor stor en mulighed det her er," siger Boesen. "Det er én ting at være en del af et så professionelt og ambitiøst hold, men den første kamp på hjemmebane? Find popcornene frem – det bliver vildt!"

partsEn.html: Nordic Storm continues to build an impressive roster for their debut European League of Football (ELF) season, bringing in three exceptional talents: Kenneth Larsen, Alexander Kennedy Chaanhing, and Marcus Boesen. Each player brings a unique skill set and story to the team, further solidifying Nordic Storm as one of the most exciting franchises in the ELF.

cEyED9iT2GItygjCmDFV.titleEn: Danish NFL star, Hjalte Froholdt, on why he became a co-owner and ambassador of Nordic Storm

parts.html:
Tilbage i november måned blev Danmarks eneste NFL-spiller præsenteret som medejer og ambassadør hos det nye mandskab, Nordic Storm. Den store profil - både i overført og fysisk forstand - giver her sin vurdering af, hvad der gjorde, at han hoppede om bord på projektet. 

Hjalte Froholdt har over de seneste sæsoner etableret sig som spiller i den bedste liga i amerikansk fodbold, NFL. Særligt efter han i 2022 rykkede til Arizona Cardinals har den danske ørkenviking haft enorm succes, og det hårde arbejde blev sidste år belønnet med en to-årig kontrakt til en værdi på 12 millioner dollars. 

Nu mener Froholdt at der er overskud til at hjælpe sporten til nye højder i hjemlandet, gennem det dansk-svenske storsatsende projekt, Nordic Storm: " Det at udvikle amerikansk fodbold i Norden, det er måske noget jeg nu har lyst til at være mere en del af, end jeg har gjort de sidste par år. "Og jeg tror at muligheden er her med Nordic Storm, som kører fronten og mig som del af det.” Udtaler Cardinals-spilleren, der også ser frem til at til stede under Nordic Storms kampe og events: “ Så kan jeg komme hjem og være en deltager til nogle af kampene og forhåbentligt lave nogle events her inden for de kommende år, og selvfølgelig hjælpe til at Football bliver større i Norden “. 

Danskerens rejse med football startede dog i et noget mere beskedent miljø hos Svendborg Admirals – en klub, der i dag ikke længere eksisterer på grund af manglende medlemmer. Og det er noget, der berører Froholdt: “ Det giver football en mulighed for at kunne blive større ude i klubberne og ude i udkantsdanmark, hvor min klub, Svendborg Admirals, desværre blev nødt til at lukke fordi der ikke var nok kontingenter, spillere og drenge der havde lyst til at spille football. Og ved at hoppe på det her projekt, så er det noget jeg håber der vil give noget interesse for football - ikke kun i Danmark men i hele Norden." 

Men selvom den drivende faktor for Hjalte Froholdt er udviklingen af sporten i Norden, betyder det på ingen måde, at han ikke har de sportslige resultater for øje: “ Om 5 år håber jeg at vi har vundet nogle championships, vundet nogle kampe, og ligesom etableret os selv i ELF. “

Desuden har han store forventninger til Nordics Storms potentiale for at sætte en ny standard for amerikansk fodbold i regionen: “Jeg håber Nordic Storm bliver en katalysator for football i Norden og at det er noget hvor alle drenge ikke tænker enten er det NFL eller ingenting. Nej, nu kan man også spille professionelt football på hjemmebane.” 

Nordic Storm spiller deres første kamp d. 18 maj i Schweiz, og har første hjemmebanekamp d. 1 juni på Gladsaxe Stadion, når de tager imod Berlin Thunder.
parts.htmlEn:
Back in November, Denmark's only NFL player was presented as a co-owner and ambassador of the newest ELF-team, Nordic Storm. The big profile - both figuratively and physically - gives his assessment of what made him jump on board the project. 

Over recent seasons, Hjalte Froholdt has established himself as a key player in the best league of American football, the NFL. Especially after he moved to the Arizona Cardinals in 2022, the Danish Desert Viking has had tremendous success, and the hard work was rewarded last year with a two-year contract worth $12 million. 

Now Froholdt believes that it is time to help the sport to new heights in his home country through the ambitious Danish-Swedish Franchise, Nordic Storm: " Developing American football in the Nordics is something I want to be a part of more than I have done in the last few years. And I think the opportunity is here with the Nordic Storm leading the way and with me as part of it. " The Cardinals player explains, while also looking forward to being present during Nordic Storm's matches and events: " Now I can come home and be a participant at some of the games and hopefully do some events here in the coming years, and of course help to make Football bigger in the Nordics". 

However, the Danes journey with football started in a somewhat more modest environment at Svendborg Admirals – a club that no longer exists today due to a lack of members. And that is something that touches Froholdt on a personal level: " This project gives football an opportunity to become bigger in the clubs and in the less populated parts of Denmark, where my club, Svendborg Admirals, unfortunately had to close because there were not enough players who wanted to play football. "And by jumping on this project, it is something that I hope will generate some interest in football - not only in Denmark but in the entire Nordic Region." 

But even if the driving factor for Hjalte Froholdt is the development of the sport in the Nordics, this in no way means that he does not have the athletic performance of the team in mind: " In 5 years, I hope we will have won some championships, won some 

matches, and just like established ourselves in the European League of Football. " Furthermore, he has high expectations for the newcomers' potential to set a new standard for American football in the region: "I hope Nordic Storm becomes a catalyst

for football in the Nordics and that it's something where all boys no longer think it's the NFL or bust. Now you can also play professional football at home.” 

Nordic Storm will play their first game on May 18th in Switzerland, while the first home game takes place June 1st at Gladsaxe Stadium, when they take on the Berlin Thunder.

dbbVjAbHvR7X2DjK77vP.titleEn: Nordic Storm Ends a Blockbuster Week of Signings with Swedish Linebacker Ludvig Myrén

parts.html:
Nordic Storm Ends a Blockbuster Week of Signings with Swedish Linebacker Ludvig Myrén

Nordic Storm is not holding back as they assemble a powerhouse roster for their debut ELF season. The latest addition? None other than Swedish standout linebacker Ludvig Myrén.

A Proven Defensive Powerhouse

At just 23 years old, Myrén brings a wealth of experience and talent to the Storm defense. The Swedish native honed his skills over three seasons with the Berlin Thunder, becoming a cornerstone of their defense. His stats speak volumes: in 33 games, Myrén racked up an astonishing 338 tackles, including 36 for loss, 10 sacks, 11 pass breakups, and six forced turnovers—two of which he turned into touchdowns.

The 184cm, 97kg linebacker combines physicality, speed, and game awareness, making him a nightmare for opposing offenses. With his signing, the Storm adds an elite talent who knows how to dominate on the field and lead by example.

A Storm Defense Taking Shape

Myrén’s signing marks another significant step in solidifying the Storm defense. He joins a growing list of standout defensive players, including defensive end Max Parkinson and strong safety Chad Walrond. Together, they form a unit that’s shaping up to be as fierce as the Nordic storms they represent.

"Bringing the Storm to Sweden and Denmark"

The Nordic Storm's efforts to build a competitive roster are creating a buzz across the ELF community, and Ludvig Myrén is the latest name to watch. With his skillset and experience, he promises to make a huge impact on the field while inspiring a new generation of Scandinavian football fans.

One thing is clear: the Storm isn’t just gathering talent—they’re setting the stage for an electrifying season.

partsEn.html:
Nordic Storm Afslutter en Blokbuster Uge med Signeringen af Svenske Linebacker Ludvig Myrén

Nordic Storm holder sig ikke tilbage, når det kommer til at opbygge en stærk trup til deres debut i ELF-sæsonen. Den seneste tilføjelse? Ingen ringere end den svenske linebacker-stjerne Ludvig Myrén.

En Bevist Defensiv Kraft

Kun 23 år gammel bringer Myrén en enorm erfaring og talent til Storms forsvar. Den svenske spiller finpudsede sine evner over tre sæsoner hos Berlin Thunder, hvor han blev en hjørnesten i deres forsvar. Hans statistik taler for sig selv: I 33 kampe opnåede Myrén imponerende 338 tacklinger, heraf 36 for tab, 10 sacks, 11 afværgede afleveringer og seks forcerede turnovers—hvoraf to blev forvandlet til touchdowns.

Den 184 cm høje og 97 kg tunge linebacker kombinerer fysisk styrke, fart og spilforståelse, hvilket gør ham til en mareridtmodstander for angreb. Med denne signering tilføjer Storm en elitær spiller, der både kan dominere på banen og lede med sit eksempel.

Et Forsvar i Stormvejr

Myréns signering markerer endnu et vigtigt skridt i at styrke Storms forsvar. Han slutter sig til en voksende liste af markante defensive spillere, herunder defensive end Max Parkinson og strong safety Chad Walrond. Sammen danner de en enhed, der ser ud til at blive lige så frygtindgydende som de nordiske storme, de repræsenterer.

"Bringer Stormen til Sverige og Danmark"

Nordic Storms bestræbelser på at opbygge en konkurrencedygtig trup skaber stor opmærksomhed i ELF-samfundet, og Ludvig Myrén er det seneste navn, man skal holde øje med. Med hans evner og erfaring lover han at gøre en enorm forskel på banen og inspirere en ny generation af skandinaviske footballfans.

En ting er sikkert: Stormen samler ikke bare talenter—de sætter scenen for en elektrificerende sæson.

parts.html: Som debutkampen for Nordic Storm rykker tættere og tættere på, har holdet tilføjet tre nye signinger, der fremhæver regionens voksende talentmasse og lover en elektrisk første sæson for Storm.
parts.htmlEn: As the Nordic Storm debut game moves closer and closer, the team has added three new signings that highlight the region's growing football talent and promise an electrifying first season for the Storm.

parts.html:
Hjalmer Nielsen – Dansk Defensive Back

Den 25-årige danske stjernespiller Hjalmer Nielsen bringer mesterskabserfaring til Storm. Som et produkt af den nordiske football-scene har Nielsen skærpet sine evner hos Fehérvár Enthroners og vundet den tyske mesterskabstitel med Potsdam Royals. Hans dynamiske spillestil og erfaring gør ham til en nøglespiller i Storms forsvar.

"Jeg kan ikke vente med at vise Europa niveauet af talent i den nordiske region. Gør jer klar – Stormen er på vej," siger Nielsen.
parts.htmlEn:
Hjalmer Nielsen – Danish Defensive Back

The 25-year-old Danish standout Hjalmer Nielsen brings championship pedigree to the Storm. A product of the Nordic football scene, Nielsen honed his skills with the Fehérvár Enthroners and won the German Bowl with the Potsdam Royals. His dynamic playstyle and experience make him a cornerstone of the Storm’s defense.

"I can't wait to show Europe the level of talent in the Nordic region. Brace yourself, the storm is coming," says Nielsen.

parts.html:
Andre Persson – Svensk Running Back Coach

Andre Persson slutter sig til trænerstaben med en stærk baggrund inden for udvikling af unge talenter. Han har tidligere været Offensive Coordinator for Kristianstad Predators’ U19-hold og Wide Receiver Coach for det svenske ungdomslandshold. Persson er klar til at lede en talentfuld RB-gruppe hos Storm.

"Hej Storm-fans! Mit navn er Andre, og jeg glæder mig til at se jer alle på tribunerne på Gladsaxe Stadion i år. Jeg er utrolig begejstret for at arbejde med en enormt talentfuld RB-gruppe, og jeg kan ikke vente med at komme i gang. Go Storm!"
parts.htmlEn:
Andre Persson – Swedish Running Back Coach

Andre Persson joins the coaching staff with a proven track record of developing young talent. Previously the U19 Offensive Coordinator for the Kristianstad Predators and Wide Receiver Coach for the Swedish Youth National Team, Persson is ready to lead a talented Storm RB group.

"Hello Storm fans! My name is Andre, and I can't wait to see you all in the stands at Gladsaxe Stadium this year. I'm incredibly excited to be leading an incredibly talented RB group, and I can't wait to get to work with them. Go Storm!"

Love Larsson – Swedish Offensive Lineman

At just 24, Swedish OL Love Larsson is already a standout talent. A former Stockholm Mean Machines player, Larsson is thrilled to join the Storm and elevate his game under the guidance of Coach McCusker.

"It's such an honor to be part of the launch of the first ELF Nordic team. I'm super excited to play with the big boys and show everyone what I'm capable of. With the help of Coach McCusker, I'm ready for the next level," Larsson shared.
parts.html:
Love Larsson – Svensk Offensive Lineman

Svenske Love Larsson er kun 24 år, men allerede en spiller med imponerende potentiale. Som tidligere spiller for Stockholm Mean Machines ser Larsson frem til at tage sit spil til næste niveau under Coach McCuskers vejledning.

"Det er en kæmpe ære at være en del af opstarten af det første ELF-hold i Norden. Jeg glæder mig til at spille med de store drenge og vise alle, hvad jeg er i stand til. Med hjælp fra Coach McCusker er jeg klar til at tage det næste skridt," siger Larsson.

fXMD1CAtzV2OivW3XmLB.title: Nordic Storm henter stjernereceiver Brendan Beaulieu
fXMD1CAtzV2OivW3XmLB.titleEn: Nordic Storm Sign Star Receiver Brendan Beaulieu

partsEn.html:
Nordic Storm have added another key piece to their offense with the signing of wide receiver Brendan Beaulieu for their 2025 debut season in the European League of Football. The former Potsdam Royals standout brings elite playmaking ability to Copenhagen as the team prepares for its first campaign.

Beaulieu dominated the 2024 German Football League season, racking up 1,647 receiving yards and 27 touchdowns in just 15 games. His arrival strengthens an already explosive offense, making Nordic Storm a serious threat in their inaugural year.

Excited for this new chapter, Beaulieu is eager to hit the field.

"This is a once-in-a-lifetime opportunity. I am beyond grateful to be a part of this franchise! Can’t wait to go out there and compete with my teammates and for the city of Copenhagen. Go Storm!"

With his athleticism and ability to make big plays, Beaulieu is expected to be a game-changer for the Storm. As the team continues to build its roster, anticipation grows for what promises to be an electrifying first season in the ELF.

parts.html:
Nordic Storm har sikret sig endnu en nøglespiller til deres angreb med tilføjelsen af wide receiver Brendan Beaulieu til deres debut i European League of Football i 2025. Den tidligere Potsdam Royals-profil bringer masser af playmaking-evner til København, hvor holdet gør klar til sin første sæson.

Beaulieu imponerede i den tyske liga i 2024, hvor han leverede 1.647 receiving yards og 27 touchdowns på bare 15 kampe. Han slutter sig nu til en allerede stærk offensiv, hvilket gør Nordic Storm til en farlig modstander fra dag ét.

Han ser frem til den nye udfordring og glæder sig til at komme i gang.

"Det her er en enestående mulighed. Jeg er utrolig taknemmelig for at blive en del af denne klub! Jeg kan ikke vente med at komme på banen og kæmpe sammen med mine holdkammerater og for byen København. Go Storm!"

Med sin fysik, hurtighed og evne til at afgøre kampe forventes Beaulieu at spille en central rolle for Storm. Som truppen tager form, stiger spændingen forud for holdets første sæson i ELF.

partsEn.html:
Nordic Storm is set for an electrifying debut season in the European League of Football (ELF). The team’s schedule features match-ups against some of the league’s top contenders, promising action-packed games for fans.

Here’s a quick look at our 2025 opponents:

  • Rhein Fire – Weeks 9 and 14
  • Hamburg Sea Devils – Weeks 8 and 13
  • Berlin Thunder – Weeks 3 and 10
  • Helvetic Mercenaries – Weeks 1 and 7
  • Wroclaw Panthers – Weeks 2 and 6
  • Frankfurt Galaxy – Weeks 5 and 11

This season is Nordic Storm’s chance to prove itself on the ELF stage. With fresh rivalries and high-stakes games, fans won’t want to miss a moment!

parts.html:
Nordic Storm gør klar til en elektrisk debutsæson i European League of Football (ELF). Holdets kampplan byder på møder med nogle af ligaens stærkeste modstandere, og der er masser af action i vente for fansene.

Her er et hurtigt overblik over vores 2025-modstandere:

  • Rhein Fire – Uge 9 og 14
  • Hamburg Sea Devils – Uge 8 og 13
  • Berlin Thunder – Uge 3 og 10
  • Helvetic Mercenaries – Uge 1 og 7
  • Wroclaw Panthers – Uge 2 og 6
  • Frankfurt Galaxy – Uge 5 og 11

Denne sæson er Nordic Storms chance for at bevise sig på ELF-scenen. Med nye rivaler og intense kampe på programmet, bliver det en sæson, du ikke vil gå glip af!

hpQ3tdjU0GeN0inyTXEp.title: Emmanuel Falola skriver under med Nordic Storm
hpQ3tdjU0GeN0inyTXEp.titleEn: Emmanuel Falola Signs with the Nordic Storm

parts.htmlEn:
The Nordic Storm are proud to announce the signing of British linebacker Emmanuel Falola for the upcoming season.

Falola joins the Storm fresh off a stint with the Rhein Fire in the 2024 European League of Football (ELF) season — where he was part of a dominant defense of championship pedigree. His addition brings proven experience, versatility, and international pedigree to our linebacker corps.

At 6’2” and 230 pounds, Falola is a physical presence on the field with sideline-to-sideline range, explosive tackling, and high football IQ. The 27-year-old has played at the highest levels across both Europe and North America — and now, he brings that global experience to Nordic soil.

Falola’s football journey began in the UK, where he helped lead Coventry University to back-to-back BUCS Division 2 Championships in 2018 and 2019. He continued his rise with the Kent Exiles and Bristol Aztecs, leading both in tackles and pushing the Aztecs into a 2022 playoff run.

In 2023, Falola was drafted by the Toronto Argonauts in the CFL Global Draft. His raw athleticism and skill earned him invitations to both the NFL International Player Pathway Program and the CFL Global Combine — placing him firmly on the radar of scouts worldwide.

With Falola now anchoring the defense, the Nordic Storm are taking a huge step forward in their championship pursuit.

Welcome to the Storm, Emmanuel. Let’s make history.
parts.html:
Nordic Storm kan med stor stolthed præsentere vores nyeste forstærkning: den britiske linebacker Emmanuel Falola, som slutter sig til holdet op til den kommende sæson.

Falola kommer til Storm efter et år i Rhein Fire. Her var han en del af et af ligaens mest frygtede forsvar og bidrog med erfaring, fysik og disciplin på højeste europæiske niveau.

Med sine 186 cm og 102 kg er Falola en markant tilstedeværelse på banen. Han er kendt for sin eksplosive tacklingsevne, hurtighed på tværs af banen og sit høje spilintellekt. Den 27-årige har allerede spillet i både Europa og Nordamerika – og nu glæder vi os til at se ham i Storm-trøjen.

Hans fodboldrejse begyndte i Storbritannien, hvor han førte Coventry University til to BUCS Division 2-mesterskaber i 2018 og 2019. Herefter var han en dominerende forsvarsspiller hos både Kent Exiles og Bristol Aztecs, hvor han var toneangivende i Aztecs’ slutspilsrun i 2022.

I 2023 blev Falola valgt af Toronto Argonauts i CFL Global Draft. Hans fysiske evner og potentiale har desuden sikret ham invitationer til både NFL’s International Player Pathway Program og CFL Global Combine – en tydelig indikation af, at hans talent er blevet bemærket internationalt.

Med Falola som ny drivkraft i forsvaret tager Nordic Storm endnu et skridt mod toppen.

Velkommen til Storm, Emmanuel. Lad os skrive historie sammen.

parts.html:
Efterhånden som kickoff til den kommende ELF-sæson nærmer sig, fortsætter Nordic Storm med at styrke truppen med store nye tilføjelser.

To Nordiske Powerhouses Forstærker Skyttegravene

Mathias Hummelmose og Mark Rosenquist  tilfører styrke og fysik til skyttegravene og forstærker begge sider af linjen.

Den 30-årige Mathias Hummelmose, en dansk offensiv linjemand, tilslutter sig Nordic Storm med en rig erfaring fra både den nationale og internationale scene. Efter at have spillet i ELF i to sæsoner, kender Hummelmose kravene i Europas førende football-liga. Hans rejse har bragt ham til Barcelona Dragons i 2022 og videre til Prague Lions i 2024, hvor han blev udnævnt til holdkaptajn.

Hummelmose er kendt for sin alsidighed. Uanset om han spiller tackle, guard eller center, har han konsekvent været en vigtig brik for hvert hold, han har været en del af. Hans karriere omfatter også danske hold som Vejle Razorbacks og Odense Swans, hvor han har etableret sig som en pålidelig starter.

"Jeg er beæret over at være en del af det nordiske franchise," sagde Hummelmose. "Jeg vil gøre mit bedste for at sikre vores fremtidige succes og bidrage til at bygge en nordisk kæmpe! Let's go Storm!"

På den defensive side slutter den svenske defensive tackle Mark Rosenquist sig til holdet for at styrke linjen og skabe problemer for modstandernes offensiver. Den 194 cm høje og 150 kg tunge spiller bringer en imponerende kombination af størrelse, styrke og atletik til skyttegravene, hvilket gør livet svært for offensive linjer i hele ligaen.

Født i Stockholm som søn af en filippinsk mor og en svensk far, begyndte han sin karriere med fodbold, før han som teenager opdagede football. Hans talent førte ham fra de svenske klubhold til den internationale scene, hvor han repræsenterede Sverige ved Junior Europamesterskaberne i 2010 og senere ved Junior Verdensmesterskaberne i Austin, Texas.

Rosenquists vej førte ham til USA, hvor han udviklede sine færdigheder på Lake Forest Academy i Illinois og Butte Community College i Californien, inden han sluttede sig til Grand Valley State University (GVSU) i Michigan. Som nose guard hos GVSU blev Rosenquist kendt for sin fysiske tilstedeværelse, der stoppede modstanderens løb og endte i flere dobbelt blokeringer.

Nordic Storm Tilføjer Offensive Våben med Tribler og Green

Nordic Storm fortsætter med at samle en imponerende trup til deres første ELF-sæson og har tilføjet to spændende offensive talenter til arsenalet. Oliver Tribler og Jakob Green, begge erfarne danske spillere, bringer alsidighed, atletik og erfaring til holdets offensiv.

Den 27-årige Oliver Tribler er klar til en frisk start med Nordic Storm. Den danske spiller kan både spille tight end og fullback og tilfører holdet værdifuld fleksibilitet i blokeringer og offensive spil.

Triblers 2024-sæson var en omtumlet rejse, der begyndte hos Helvetic Guards, hvor uenigheder om hans rolle førte til en tidlig afsked. Han skrev derefter under med Tirol Raiders, men måtte igen skifte midt i sæsonen. Til sidst sluttede han sig til Fehérvár Enthroners, hvor han spillede to kampe og opnåede tre receptions for 55 yards.

Nu vender Tribler tilbage til Danmark, hvor hans karriere begyndte med Ørestaden Spartans, hvor han blev kåret som MVP, og senere fortsatte med Copenhagen Towers.

Ved hans side på offensiven slutter den 25-årige wide receiver Jakob Green sig til holdet. Green, der har football rødder i både Danmark og USA, har endnu ikke spillet i ELF, men hans rejse lover stort potentiale for Storms kasteangreb.

Green begyndte sin karriere hos Copenhagen Towers, før han rejste til USA for at udvikle sine færdigheder. I New Jersey spillede han for Princeton High School, hvor han også fungerede som kicker og demonstrerede sin alsidighed.

Efter high school fortsatte Green sin football-karriere på college-niveau med College of New Jersey Lions i NCAA Division III. Med et solidt fundament i konkurrencedygtig football vender han nu tilbage til Danmark for at debutere i ELF.

"Jeg er virkelig begejstret for at blive en del af dette hold og repræsentere Storm i European League of Football," sagde Green. "Muligheden for at arbejde med så talentfulde holdkammerater og dedikerede trænere er noget, jeg virkelig ser frem til. Jeg kan ikke vente med at mærke energien fra Storm-fans, når vi gør dette til et år, alle kommer til at huske!"

Storm Sikrer stærkt Trænerteam med Eisenstadt og McCusker

Ud over at opbygge en stærk trup har Nordic Storm gjort vigtige tilføjelser til deres trænerstab og hentet to erfarne og højt respekterede football-trænere. Den amerikanske secondary coach Samuel Eisenstadt og den skotske offensive line coach Stevie McCusker slutter sig til holdet og tilfører lederskab og ekspertise til sidelinjen.

Kun 27 år gammel har Samuel Eisenstadt allerede opbygget et imponerende træner-CV, inklusive mesterskaber i både Sverige og Spanien. Eisenstadt blev først kendt som head coach og defensiv koordinator for Örebro Black Knights, hvor han førte holdet til deres første svenske mesterskab i 2021. Han fulgte op på succesen ved at føre Las Rozas Black Demons til deres første spanske mesterskab i 2023, hvor han afsluttede en ubesejret sæson med et forsvar, der kun tillod 68 point i 10 kampe.

Eisenstadt bringer også ELF-erfaring med sig, efter at have været safeties coach for Barcelona Dragons. Hans evne til at opbygge eliteforsvar har gjort ham til en af de mest lovende unge trænertalenter inden for europæisk football.

Oprindeligt fra Fair Haven, New Jersey blev Eisenstadts karriere som defensiv back afbrudt af en skade i hans første år på Elon University. Ufortrødent skiftede han til en trænerrolle og startede som assisterende defensiv secondary coach på Elon. Siden da har han hurtigt avanceret gennem rækkerne og tilfører energi, taktisk dygtighed og dokumenteret succes i alle de roller, han har påtaget sig.

Hans ansættelse understreger Nordic Storms engagement i et disciplineret og aggressivt forsvar, og med Eisenstadt ved roret for secondary-enheden er holdets defensive linje klar til succes.

På den offensive side af bolden tilslutter Stevie McCusker sig Nordic Storm som ansvarlig for den offensive linje. Med over 30 års erfaring på flere niveauer er McCusker en af Europas mest erfarne og respekterede football-trænere.

McCuskers rejse begyndte som spiller i 1984 og kulminerede i en karriere som offensiv linjemand for Scottish Claymores i NFL Europe, samt ophold hos Glasgow Diamonds og Glasgow Lions. Han repræsenterede også Skotland på ungdoms- og universitetslandshold.

Som træner inkluderer McCuskers CV fem år med Scottish Claymores og en sommer som assisterende træner for Kansas City Chiefs i NFL. Han har trænet forskellige positioner, herunder running backs, tight ends og special teams, og har haft roller som både offensiv koordinator og special teams koordinator.

Senest har McCusker været aktiv i Danmark, hvor han har trænet Copenhagen Towers og bidraget til det danske U19-landshold. Med en dyb forståelse for offensive line-spil og en bred international erfaring er McCusker det perfekte valg til at udvikle Nordic Storms frontlinje og sikre holdets offensive succes.

partsEn.html:
As the kickoff to the upcoming ELF season approaches, Nordic Storm continues to solidify its roster with standout additions.

Two Nordic Powerhouses Strengthen the Trenches

Mathias Hummelmose and Mark Rosenquist, promise to bring strength and physicality to the trenches, fortifying both sides of the line of scrimmage.

The 30-year-old Mathias Hummelmose, a Danish offensive lineman, joins Nordic Storm with a wealth of experience from both national and international stages. Having competed in the ELF for two seasons, Hummelmose is no stranger to the demands of Europe’s premier football league. His journey has seen him play for the Barcelona Dragons in 2022, followed by the Prague Lions in 2024, where he was named team captain.

Hummelmose's versatility is his hallmark. Whether at tackle, guard, or center, he has consistently played a pivotal role for every team he has joined. His career also includes time with Danish teams such as the Vejle Razorbacks and Odense Swans, where he established himself as a reliable starter.

"I'm honored to be part of this Nordic franchise," said Hummelmose. "I’ll do my best to ensure its future success and contribute to building a Nordic powerhouse! Let's go Storm!"

On the defensive side, Mark Rosenquist, a towering Swedish defensive tackle, joins the team to anchor the line and disrupt opposing offenses. The 195cm tall, 150kg force brings an imposing combination of size, strength, and athleticism to the trenches, making life difficult for offensive lines across the league.

Born in Stockholm to a Filipino mother and Swedish father, he grew up playing soccer before discovering football in his preteen years. From there, his talent propelled him from Swedish club teams to the international stage, representing Sweden at the Junior European Championships in 2010 and subsequently the Junior World Championships in Austin, Texas.

Rosenquist’s path led him to the United States, where he honed his craft at Lake Forest Academy in Illinois and Butte Community College in California before joining Grand Valley State University (GVSU) in Michigan. As a nose guard for GVSU, Rosenquist became known for his physical presence, plugging gaps, drawing double teams, and making life difficult for opposing running backs.

Nordic Storm Adds Offensive Firepower with Tribler and Green

As Nordic Storm continues to assemble a formidable roster for its inaugural ELF season, the franchise has added two exciting offensive talents to its arsenal. Oliver Tribler and Jakob Green, both accomplished Danish players, bring versatility, athleticism, and experience to the team’s offensive lineup.

At 27 years old, Oliver Tribler is ready for a fresh start with Nordic Storm. The Dane’s ability to play both tight end and fullback offers the team valuable flexibility in its blocking schemes and offensive playbook.

Tribler’s journey has been anything but ordinary. His 2024 season was a whirlwind, starting with the Helvetic Guards, where disputes over his role led to an early departure. He then signed with the Tirol Raiders, but again found himself on the move midseason. Ultimately, he landed with the Fehérvár Enthroners, where he played two games and recorded three receptions for 55 yards.

Now, Tribler is coming full circle by returning to his home country. His football career began with the Ørestaden Spartans, where he earned MVP honors, and continued with the Copenhagen Towers.

Joining Tribler on offense is 25-year-old wide receiver Jakob Green, a homegrown talent with footballing roots in both Denmark and the us. Though Green has yet to play in the ELF, his football journey spans international borders and promises great potential for the Storm’s passing game.

Green began his career with the Copenhagen Towers before heading to the United States to further develop his skills. In New Jersey, he played for Princeton High School, where he also served as a kicker, demonstrating his versatility and athleticism.

Following high school, Green continued his football career at the collegiate level, playing for the College of New Jersey Lions in NCAA Division III. With a solid foundation in competitive football, he now returns to Denmark to make his ELF debut.

"I’m truly excited to join this team and represent the Storm in the European League of Football," said Green. "The opportunity to work with such talented teammates and dedicated coaches is something I’m really looking forward to. I can’t wait to feel the energy of the Storm fans as we make this a year to remember!"

Storm Secures Elite Coaching Talent with Eisenstadt and McCusker

In addition to building a strong roster, Nordic Storm has made key additions to its coaching staff, bringing in two experienced and highly regarded football minds. American secondary coach Samuel Eisenstadt and Scottish offensive line coach Stevie McCusker join the franchise, adding leadership and expertise to the sidelines.

At just 27 years old, Samuel Eisenstadt has already built an impressive coaching resume, including championships in both Sweden and Spain. Eisenstadt first made a name for himself as the head coach and defensive coordinator for the Örebro Black Knights, leading them to their first Swedish championship in 2021. He followed up by guiding the Las Rozas Black Demons to their maiden Spanish championship in 2023, completing an undefeated season with a defense that allowed just 68 points across 10 games.

Eisenstadt also brings ELF experience, having served as safeties coach for the Barcelona Dragons. His ability to build elite defenses has made him one of the brightest young coaching talents in European football.

Originally from Fair Haven, New Jersey, Eisenstadt’s playing career as a defensive back was cut short by injury during his freshman year at Elon University. Undeterred, he transitioned to coaching, starting as an assistant defensive secondary coach at Elon. Since then, he has risen quickly through the ranks, bringing energy, tactical acumen, and a proven track record of success to every role he’s held.

His hiring underscores Nordic Storm’s commitment to a disciplined and aggressive defense, and with Eisenstadt at the helm of the secondary, the team’s defensive unit is poised for success.

On the offensive side of the ball, Stevie McCusker joins Nordic Storm to oversee the offensive line. With over 30 years of coaching experience across multiple levels, McCusker is one of Europe’s most seasoned and respected football coaches.

McCusker’s journey began as a player, starting in 1984 and culminating in a career as an offensive lineman for the Scottish Claymores in NFL Europe, as well as stints with the Glasgow Diamonds and Glasgow Lions. He also represented Scotland in youth and university-level national teams.

As a coach, McCusker’s résumé includes time with the Scottish Claymores, where he worked for five years, and a summer stint as an assistant coach with the Kansas City Chiefs in the NFL. He has coached a variety of positions, including running backs, tight ends, and special teams, and has held roles as both an offensive coordinator and special teams coordinator.

Most recently, McCusker has been active in Denmark, coaching the Copenhagen Towers and contributing to the Danish U19 national team. With a deep understanding of offensive line play and a wealth of international experience, McCusker is the perfect fit to develop Nordic Storm’s front line and ensure the team’s offensive success.

lGrD5AsnDIKsvhfkg9Sd.title: Den Første Nordic Storm Player Combine
lGrD5AsnDIKsvhfkg9Sd.titleEn: The First-Ever Nordic Storm Player Combine

parts.html:
Lørdag den 16. november markerede vi en ekstraordinær milepæl med afholdelsen af den allerførste Nordic Storm Player Combine! Spillere fra Danmark og Sverige imponerede med deres fantastiske færdigheder og passion på banen, hvilket gjorde dagen til en stor succes.

General Manager Palle Navntoft Christensen reflekterede over begivenheden og sagde: "Forventningerne er blevet overgået. Vi har set mange dedikerede spillere møde op, og jeg kan se, at de har forberedt sig."

Det var ikke kun en betydningsfuld dag for spillerne, men også for staben, da det var første gang, alle mødtes personligt som en del af Nordic Storm. Cheftræner John Shoop delte sine tanker:

"Det var fantastisk at se vores trænerstab arbejde så hårdt. Det var første gang, vi var samlet som stab, og det var utrolig inspirerende at opleve."

Som en ekstra bonus havde vi fire af vores Storm spillere på banen, som gav vejledning og inspiration til alle deltagere. Deres tilstedeværelse understregede dagens samarbejdsånd og fremtidsvision.

Denne uforglemmelige begivenhed er kun begyndelsen på noget helt særligt. Vi bygger Stormen, og der er meget mere i vente!

partsEn.html:
On Saturday, the 16th of November, we marked an extraordinary milestone as we hosted the inaugural Nordic Storm Player Combine! Players from Denmark and Sweden brought remarkable skill and passion to the field, making the day a resounding success.

General Manager Palle Navntoft Christensen reflected on the event, saying, "Expectations have been exceeded. We have seen a lot of dedicated players showing up, and I can see they have prepared."

It wasn’t just a significant day for the players but also for the staff, as this was the first time everyone came together in person under the Nordic Storm banner. Head Coach John Shoop expressed his thoughts:

"It was amazing to see our coaching staff work as hard as they did. It was the first time we were together as a staff, and it was incredible to see."

Adding to the excitement, we were fortunate to have four of our signed players on the field, offering guidance and inspiration to all participants. Their presence underscored the collaborative and forward-thinking spirit of the day.

This unforgettable event is just the beginning of something extraordinary. We are building the Storm, and there is so much more to come!

mtVHBP4mduTHn667ypbw.title: Hjalte Froholdt bliver medejer og ambassadør for Nordic Storm
mtVHBP4mduTHn667ypbw.titleEn: Hjalte Froholdt Joins Nordic Storm as Co-Owner and Ambassador

partsEn.html: Hjalte Froholdt, starting center for the Arizona Cardinals, is now the newest member of the Nordic Storm family. The Danish athlete joins the team as a co-owner and ambassador for the Danish-Swedish ELF franchise.

A Decision Rooted in Passion

In the fourth round of the 2019 NFL Draft, the New England Patriots selected Hjalte Froholdt, then a 24-year-old standout from Arkansas who had earned Second-Team All-SEC honors. But many years before that, Hjalte began his football journey in his hometown of Svendborg, Denmark, dreaming of playing on the big stage like so many other young football players.

“American Football has been my passion ever since I started playing back home in Denmark, and it has taken me on this incredible journey to the NFL, and I’m super excited to help grow the game back home. This project isn’t just about creating a professional franchise. It’s about creating a movement across Denmark, Sweden and the entire region. Nordic Storm is helping put our passion and our love for American Football on the map, to show the entire world what we can do.”

Together, We Inspire

Since being drafted, Hjalte has become a shining example for young Nordic football players, showing them that reaching the NFL is possible. Similarly, Nordic Storm aims to inspire the Nordic football community by encouraging young players to take their first steps into the sport and work hard to achieve their dreams. By joining forces, Hjalte and Nordic Storm are sending a clear message: the Nordic football community is strong, and its talent can compete on an international level.

As an ambassador, Hjalte will stay connected throughout the season, contributing to the team’s journey from the sidelines.

“To all the fans, players, and everyone supporting this vision, thank you for being part of something bigger. Together, we are not just growing the sport, we are making history. Go Storm.”

parts.html: Hjalte Froholdt, startende center for Arizona Cardinals, er nu officielt en del af Nordic Storm-familien. Den danske atlet tilslutter sig holdet som medejer og ambassadør for det dansk-svenske ELF-hold.

En beslutning baseret på passion

I fjerde runde af NFL-draften i 2019 blev Hjalte Froholdt, dengang en 24-årig profil fra Arkansas med Second-Team All-SEC hæder, drafted af New England Patriots. Men mange år før den dag begyndte Hjalte sin fodboldrejse i hjembyen Svendborg, hvor han som mange andre unge football spillere drømte om at nå de store scener.

“Amerikansk fodbold har været min passion, siden jeg startede med at spille hjemme i Danmark, og det har taget mig på en utrolig rejse hele vejen til NFL. Men uanset hvor jeg har været, har jeg altid brændt for at udvikle sporten hjemme i Norden. Dette projekt handler ikke kun om at bygge en professionel franchise. Det handler om at skabe en bevægelse på tværs af Danmark, Sverige og hele regionen. Med Nordic Storm sætter vi vores talent, vores passion og vores kærlighed til amerikansk fodbold på landkortet og viser hele verden, hvad vi kan.”

Sammen inspirerer vi

Siden han blev drafted har Hjalte været en lysende stjerne og inspirationskilde for unge nordiske football spillere, der drømmer om at nå til de store ligaer. Ligesom Hjalte ønsker Nordic Storm at være en positiv drivkraft i det nordiske football miljø. Holdet arbejder for at inspirere unge spillere til at tage til deres første træning og til at yde den indsats, der skal til for at nå deres mål. Sammen sender Hjalte og Nordic Storm et stærkt budskab: Det nordiske football fællesskab er stærkt, og vores talent kan konkurrere på et internationalt niveau.

Som ambassadør vil Hjalte være engageret gennem hele sæsonen og tage del i holdets rejse fra sidelinjen.

“Til vores fans, spillere og alle, der støtter denne vision: Tak for at i er en del af noget større.

Sammen udvikler vi ikke bare sporten – vi skaber historie. Go Storm!”

ntQEXeFK7dZKhekE6T2j.titleEn: Nordic Storm Joins European League of Football

partsEn.html: Professional American Football comes to the Nordic countries. The Copenhagen-based Nordic Storm joins the European League of Football in 2025. The ambitions are to make the team a regular playoff contender by 2030 and a spearhead for the development of American Football and its biggest talents in the Nordic countries.
Copenhagen, Denmark, September 21st 2024 - Nordic Storm is the name of the first professional American Football team in the Nordic countries.

The new team was announced today in Gelsenkirchen, Germany, before the Championship Game of the European League of Football (ELF). Nordic Storm becomes the league’s 18th team, bringing professional American Football to a growing base of American Football fans in the Nordic countries. The team’s home ground will be Gladsaxe Stadium in Copenhagen, a venue known for its vibrant atmosphere and excellent facilities. Its first game will be in June 2025, marking the beginning of a season with at least six home and six away games.

The team’s roster will primarily feature talented Danish and Swedish homegrown players, bolstered by a select number of experienced American and European players to ensure a competitive edge. “We aim to bring the most talented Nordic players currently playing on ELF teams and those playing in national leagues throughout Europe together to create the best American Football team ever seen in the Nordics,” says Michael Planeta, Chairman of Nordic Storm.

Nordic Storm joins a prestigious league with teams across ten countries, many of which have historical ties to NFL Europe, such as the Barcelona Dragons and Frankfurt Galaxy. The establishment of Nordic Storm is a testament to the growing popularity and potential of American Football in Europe. More than 35,000 spectators are expected to attend tomorrow’s final in Gelsenkirchen and thousands more will follow the game on tv and streaming services.

Patrick Esume, commissioner of the ELF, is thrilled to have Nordic Storm join the growing ELF league: “The Nordic countries have a tradition of producing high-quality players, so Nordic Storm will bring more excitement to the league.”

Nordic Storm is founded by a group of international business professionals with a glowing passion for American Football. They all have a personal connection with the sport. Some of them have played American Football, others have family members who are active players. Several have held leadership roles in American Football clubs.

As they came to know each other, it became apparent that they all had the same dream of sharing their passion for American Football with many more people in the Nordic countries. They concluded that the best way to ignite the passion was to create a professional football team that Nordic fans could identify with and be proud of.

Ambitions are high for the team’s performance. From the outset, the mission is to make Nordic Storm a regular ELF playoff contender by 2030. Beyond the ambitions for success in the ELF lies a bold vision that Nordic Storm will spearhead the development of American Football and its biggest talents in the Nordic countries and thereby create positive momentum for the sport at all levels.

Michael Planeta states: “Nordic Storm is not just a new ELF team; it’s a new chapter for American Football in the Nordic countries from the grassroots to elite-level talent development and sports entertainment.”

parts.html: Professionel amerikansk fodbold kommer til de nordiske lande. Nordic Storm kommer med i European League of Football i 2025. Ambitionerne er at gøre holdet til en fast playoff-kandidat inden 2030 og en spydspids for udviklingen af amerikansk fodbold og dets største talenter i de nordiske lande.
København, Danmark, 21. september 2024 – Nordic Storm er navnet på det første professionelle amerikanske fodboldhold i de nordiske lande.

Det nye hold bliver annonceret i dag i Gelsenkirchen, Tyskland, i forbindelse med Championship kampen i European League of Football (ELF). Nordic Storm bliver ligaens 18. hold og bringer professionel amerikansk fodbold til en voksende base af amerikansk fodboldfans i de nordiske lande. Holdets hjemmebane bliver Gladsaxe Stadion, et sted kendt for sin livlige atmosfære og fremragende faciliteter. Holdets første kamp bliver i juni 2025, hvilket markerer starten på en sæson med mindst seks hjemmekampe og seks udekampe.

Holdets trup vil primært bestå af talentfulde danske og svenske spillere, forstærket af et udvalgt antal erfarne amerikanske og europæiske spillere for at sikre et konkurrencedygtigt hold. “Vi sigter mod at samle de mest talentfulde nordiske spillere, der i øjeblikket spiller på ELF-hold, og dem, der spiller i nationale ligaer rundt omkring i Europa, for at skabe det bedste amerikanske fodboldhold, der nogensinde er set i Norden,” siger Michael Planeta, formand for Nordic Storm.

Nordic Storm tilslutter sig en prestigefyldt liga med hold på tværs af ti lande, hvoraf mange har historiske bånd til NFL Europe, såsom Barcelona Dragons og Frankfurt Galaxy. Etableringen af Nordic Storm er et bevis på den voksende popularitet og potentiale for amerikansk fodbold i Europa. Mere end 35.000 tilskuere vil være til stede ved søndagens finale i Gelsenkirchen, og tusindvis flere vil følge kampen på tv og streamingtjenester.

Patrick Esume, kommissær for ELF, er begejstret over at få Nordic Storm med i den voksende ELF-franchise: “De nordiske lande har en tradition for at producere spillere af høj kvalitet, så Nordic Storm vil bringe mere spænding til ligaen.”

Nordic Storm er grundlagt af en gruppe danske erhvervsfolk med en brændende passion for amerikansk fodbold. De har alle en personlig forbindelse til sporten. Nogle af dem har selv spillet amerikansk fodbold, andre har familiemedlemmer, der er aktive spillere. Flere har haft lederroller i amerikanske fodboldklubber i den danske nationale liga.

Da de lærte hinanden at kende, blev det tydeligt, at de alle havde den samme drøm om at dele deres passion for amerikansk fodbold med mange flere mennesker i de nordiske lande. De konkluderede, at den bedste måde at tænde denne passion på var at skabe et professionelt fodboldhold, som de nordiske fans kunne identificere sig med og være stolte af.

Ambitionerne for holdet er høje. Fra begyndelsen er missionen at gøre Nordic Storm til en fast deltager i ELF-playoffs inden 2030. Udover ambitionerne om succes i ELF ligger en dristig vision om, at Nordic Storm vil være spydspids for udviklingen af amerikansk fodbold og dets største talenter i de nordiske lande og dermed skabe positivt momentum for sporten på alle niveauer.

Michael Planeta siger: “Nordic Storm er ikke bare et nyt ELF-hold; det er et nyt kapitel for amerikansk fodbold i de nordiske lande, fra græsrodsniveau til talentudvikling på eliteniveau og sportsunderholdning.”

parts.html:
Nordic Storm er stolte over at præsentere Nordic Storm Cheerleaders, en ny tilføjelse, der vil forstærke kampdagsstemningen på Gladsaxe Stadion. Når holdet går ind i sin første sæson i European League of Football (ELF), vil cheerleaderne spille en central rolle i at skabe en energisk og engagerende atmosfære for fansene. Deres optrædener vil bringe liv på tribunerne, styrke holdånden og bidrage til en uforglemmelig stadionoplevelse.

Mere end blot performere vil Nordic Storm Cheerleaders også fungere som ambassadører for holdet ved at deltage i fællesskabsarrangementer, medieoptrædener og skabe en tættere forbindelse mellem klubben og dens fans. Under ledelse af den erfarne koreograf Nancy Põlluste vil truppen levere dynamiske rutiner, der kombinerer hip-hop, jazz og pom-stilarter, og dermed sikre underholdning på højt niveau gennem hele sæsonen.

For at opbygge dette hold søger Nordic Storm passionerede og talentfulde dansere, der ønsker at være en del af noget helt særligt. Tryouts er åbne for personer med stærke performancemæssige færdigheder, karisma og begejstring for at engagere sig med fansene. Udvælgelsesprocessen omfatter en indledende videoprøve, efterfulgt af interviews og en live finaleaudition i København den 22. marts. De, der bliver en del af holdet, vil ikke blot optræde ved hjemmekampe, men også få mulighed for at rejse rundt i Europa til udvalgte udekampe, hvilket gør dette til en enestående oplevelse.

Selvom rollen ikke er økonomisk aflønnet, vil cheerleaderne modtage officielt holdmerchandise, uniformer, træningstøj og dækning af rejseudgifter i forbindelse med udekampe. Ugentlige træninger vil sikre, at holdet er forberedt til at levere underholdning på højeste niveau til hver kamp.

Tryout-registreringen åbner den 10. februar, og videoindsendelser skal være modtaget senest den 28. februar. Dette er en unik mulighed for at blive en del af en banebrydende tid i nordisk sportsunderholdning og bringe energi og entusiasme til ELF’s nyeste franchise. Interesserede bør indsende deres ansøgning og materialer inden deadline for at komme i betragtning til denne spændende mulighed.

Du kan skrive dig op til tryouts her.
parts.htmlEn:
Nordic Storm is proud to introduce the Nordic Storm Cheerleaders, a new addition set to enhance the game day atmosphere at Gladsaxe Stadium. As the team embarks on its inaugural season in the European League of Football (ELF), the cheerleaders will play a key role in creating an electrifying and engaging environment for fans. Their performances will bring energy to the stands, boost team spirit, and contribute to an unforgettable stadium experience.

More than just performers, the Nordic Storm Cheerleaders will also serve as ambassadors for the team, participating in community events, media appearances, and fostering a deeper connection between the club and its supporters. Under the leadership of experienced choreographer Nancy Põlluste, the squad will deliver dynamic routines that blend hip-hop, jazz, and pom styles, ensuring high-energy entertainment throughout the season.

To build this team, Nordic Storm is looking for passionate and talented dancers who want to be part of something special. Tryouts are open to individuals with strong performance skills, charisma, and enthusiasm for engaging with fans. The selection process includes a preliminary video submission, followed by interviews and a live final audition in Copenhagen on March 22. Those who make the team will not only perform at home games but also have the opportunity to travel across Europe for select away games, making this a unique and exciting experience.

While the role is not financially compensated, cheerleaders will receive official team merchandise, uniforms, practice wear, and coverage of travel expenses for away performances. Weekly practices will ensure the team is prepared to deliver top-tier entertainment at every game.

Tryout registration opens on February 10, with video submissions due by February 28. This is a chance to be part of a groundbreaking moment in Nordic sports entertainment, bringing energy and excitement to the ELF’s newest franchise. Those interested in joining should submit their tryout materials before the deadline to be considered for this exciting new venture.

orFlM6Kju752BFYXhluu.titleEn: Safety Luke Glenna Signs with Nordic Storm

parts.htmlEn: The Nordic Storm have bolstered their defensive roster by signing former ELF All-Star safety Luke Glenna. The Minnesota native is the third American player to join the team this offseason, bringing top-tier talent to the Storm as they prepare for their inaugural season in the European League of Football (ELF).
parts.html: Nordic Storm har styrket deres defensive opstilling ved at skrive kontrakt med den tidligere ELF All-Star safety Luke Glenna. Den amerikanske spiller fra Minnesota bliver den tredje amerikaner, der tilslutter sig holdet denne offseason, og han bringer topniveau talent til Storm, der forbereder sig på deres første sæson i European League of Football (ELF).

parts.htmlEn:
Proven Playmaker

Glenna, 24, has already made a name for himself in the ELF. In 2023, he delivered an extraordinary season with the Barcelona Dragons, earning Defensive Player of the Year (DPOY) nominations and 1st Team All-Star honors after recording 137 tackles, four interceptions, and 10 pass deflections.

In 2024, Glenna continued his dominance with the Madrid Bravos, logging 76 tackles and five interceptions, playing a key role in leading the team to the playoffs in their debut season.

Collegiate Success

Before entering the ELF, Glenna was a standout at St. Thomas University, earning All-American honors and being named conference Defensive Player of the Year. The 180 cm, 85 kg safety led his team in tackles during the 2021 and 2022 seasons and amassed 13 interceptions, two forced fumbles, and two fumble recoveries during his NCAA career.
parts.html:
Playmaker

Den 24-årige Glenna har allerede skabt sig et navn i ELF. I 2023 leverede han en ekstraordinær sæson med Barcelona Dragons, hvor han blev nomineret til Defensive Player of the Year (DPOY) og udvalgt til 1st Team All-Star efter at have registreret 137 tacklinger, fire interceptions og 10 pass deflections.

I 2024 fortsatte Glenna sin dominans hos Madrid Bravos, hvor han noterede sig 76 tacklinger og fem interceptions og spillede en nøglerolle i at føre holdet til slutspillet i deres debutår.

College Succes

Før han kom til ELF, var Glenna en fremtrædende spiller på St. Thomas University, hvor han modtog All-American hæder og blev kåret til konferencens Defensive Player of the Year. Den 180 cm høje og 85 kg tunge safety ledte sit hold i tacklinger i både 2021 og 2022 og opnåede 13 interceptions, to forced fumbles og to fumble recoveries i sin NCAA-karriere.

parts.html:
Nordic Storm har officielt annonceret, at deres hjemmekampe skal spilles på Gladsaxe Stadion i Søborg, lige uden for København. Det markerer en vigtig milepæl for ELF’s første nordiske franchise, som forbereder sig på deres debut i 2025.

Gladsaxe Stadion, der normalt er hjemmebane for fodboldklubben AB Gladsaxe, har plads til op mod 13.000 tilskuere og rummer faciliteter til flere sportsgrene. Storm vil omdanne stadionet til en fodboldfest, når de tager imod stærke rivaler fra Norddivisionen som Rhein Fire, Hamburg Sea Devils og Berlin Thunder.

Valget af Gladsaxe Stadion viser franchisens ambition om at etablere en stærk nordisk tilstedeværelse i ligaen. Fans kan se frem til en elektrisk stemning, når Søborg bliver centrum for amerikansk fodbold i Danmark.
parts.htmlEn:
The Nordic Storm has officially announced that their home games will be played at Gladsaxe Stadion in Søborg, just outside Copenhagen. This marks a significant milestone for the ELF’s first Nordic franchise as they prepare for their inaugural season in 2025.

Gladsaxe Stadion, typically home to the AB Gladsaxe soccer club, can host up to 13,000 fans and features facilities for various sports. The Storm is set to transform the stadium into a football hub, welcoming fierce North Division rivals Rhein Fire, Hamburg Sea Devils, and Berlin Thunder for their home matchups.

The choice of Gladsaxe Stadion reflects the franchise’s commitment to establishing a strong Nordic presence in the league. Fans can look forward to an electrifying atmosphere as Søborg becomes the beating heart of American football in Denmark.

s2xFUuiUCUquwqp2InrO.title: Nordic Storm henter britisk defensive back Khalid Adisa
s2xFUuiUCUquwqp2InrO.titleEn: Nordic Storm Signs British Defensive Back Khalid Adisa

parts.htmlEn:
The Nordic Storm continues to strengthen their roster with the signing of Khalid Adisa, a talented 22-year-old defensive back from the UK. Adisa brings a combination of athleticism, versatility, and a promising future to the Storm's secondary.

Standing at 182 cm and weighing 87 kg, Adisa showcased his skills last season with the Barcelona Dragons in the European League of Football (ELF), recording 22 tackles, 4 pass breakups, and a blocked kick across 7 games. His playmaking ability and physical presence on the field make him a valuable addition to the Storm defense.

Adisa's football journey includes training at the prestigious NFL Academy in the UK, where he earned Defensive Player of the Year honors. He also made headlines by winning YouTuber Deestroying's 1v1 competition during the NFL's London games, earning him a spot at the Pro Bowl’s all-star event.

Adisa joins fellow Brits Chad Walrond and Glen Toonga on the Nordic Storm roster, further highlighting the team’s commitment to bringing in top international talent. With his experience, energy, and hunger to succeed, Adisa is expected to make an immediate impact as the Storm builds momentum for the upcoming season.
parts.html:
Nordic Storm har styrket holdet med endnu en spændende signing i form af den 22-årige defensive back Khalid Adisa fra Storbritannien. Adisa tilfører ungdom, atletisk evne og en lovende fremtid til Storms secondary.

Med en højde på 182 cm og en vægt på 87 kg imponerede Adisa i sidste sæson i European League of Football (ELF), hvor han spillede for Barcelona Dragons. På syv kampe leverede han 22 tacklinger, fire pass breakups og en blokeret spark, hvilket viser hans alsidighed og stærke defensive instinkter.

Adisa startede sin football-rejse i London Blitz’ ungdomsprogram, hvor han blev dobbelt national mester. Senere blev han optaget på det prestigefyldte NFL Academy i Storbritannien, hvor han trænede under toptrænere og blev kåret som årets defensive spiller. Hans talent fortsatte med at skinne igennem på Nottingham University, hvor han for alvor cementerede sin status som en af de bedste defensive spillere.

Adisa vakte også international opmærksomhed, da han vandt YouTuberen Deestroyings 1v1-konkurrence under NFL’s London Games. Denne sejr sikrede ham en invitation til Pro Bowl’s all-star event, hvor han endnu en gang viste sit talent og sin konkurrenceevne.

Med sin kombination af evner, selvtillid og kampgejst er Adisa en fantastisk tilføjelse til Storm. Fans kan se frem til en spiller, der vil gøre en forskel på banen og bringe energi til holdet i den kommende sæson. Nordic Storms secondary står stærkere end nogensinde med Adisas ankomst.

uJFB1IGQygRSSgQhl6o0.description: Nordic Storm tager store skridt op til den kommende sæson ved at tilføje to højt respekterede trænere til deres stab
uJFB1IGQygRSSgQhl6o0.descriptionEn: The Nordic Storm is making bold moves ahead of the upcoming season by adding two highly respected coaches to their staff
uJFB1IGQygRSSgQhl6o0.title: Nordic Storm styrker trænerstaben med to vigtige tilføjelser
uJFB1IGQygRSSgQhl6o0.titleEn: Nordic Storm Strengthens Coaching Staff with Two Key Additions

parts.htmlEn:
The Nordic Storm is making bold moves ahead of the upcoming season by adding two highly respected coaches to their staff: Quarterbacks Coach Henry Schlegel and Defensive Line Coach Anton Bodilsen.

At just 25 years old, Henry Schlegel has already built an impressive coaching resume. Starting as an offensive coordinator at the age of 19, Schlegel quickly ascended through the ranks, gaining experience in both European and American football. His time with the Berlin Thunder in the European League of Football saw him excel as Head of Scouting while also contributing to game planning, opponent analysis, and coaching. Known for his meticulous approach and deep understanding of football strategy, Schlegel will bring invaluable insight to the Nordic Storm’s quarterback room.
parts.html:
Nordic Storm tager store skridt op til den kommende sæson ved at tilføje to højt respekterede trænere til deres stab: Quarterbacks-træner Henry Schlegel og Defensive Line-træner Anton Bodilsen.

Kun 25 år gammel har Henry Schlegel allerede opbygget en imponerende trænerkarriere. Han startede som offensiv koordinator som 19-årig og avancerede hurtigt i rækkerne, hvor han fik erfaring i både europæisk og amerikansk fodbold. Hans tid hos Berlin Thunder i European League of Football gjorde ham til en fremragende scoutingchef, hvor han også bidrog til kampplanlægning, modstanderanalyse og træning. Kendt for sin minutiøse tilgang og dybe forståelse af fodboldstrategi vil Schlegel tilføre uvurderlig indsigt til Nordic Storms quarterbacks.

På den defensive side tiltræder Anton Bodilsen som ny Defensive Line-træner. Med næsten 30 års erfaring i fodbold har Bodilsen trænet på flere niveauer i Danmark og internationalt. Uden for banen er han kendt som NFL-ekspert på dansk tv, hvor han leverer dybdegående analyser af spillet. Hans passion og dedikation til spillerudvikling vil være afgørende for at styrke Storms defensive front. Om sin nye rolle udtalte Bodilsen: "Jeg har været en del af amerikansk fodbold i næsten 30 år, så jeg er super begejstret for at være med til at skrive historie med det første professionelle hold i Skandinavien. Jeg vil være kompromisløs i min stræben efter at få holdet til at nå sit fulde potentiale og være den bedste holdkammerat, jeg kan."
parts.htmlEn: On the defensive side, Anton Bodilsen joins as the new Defensive Line Coach. With nearly 30 years of experience in football, Bodilsen has coached at multiple levels in Denmark and internationally. Beyond the field, he is well known as an NFL pundit on Danish television, offering expert analysis on the game. His passion and dedication to player development will be crucial in strengthening the Storm’s defensive front. Speaking on his new role, Bodilsen shared, *"I have been part of football for almost 30 years, so I am super excited to be part of history in the making with the first pro team in Scandinavia. I will be relentless in my pursuit to make the team reach its full potential and be the best teammate I can."

Speaking on his new role, Bodilsen shared, *"I have been part of football for almost 30 years, so I am super excited to be part of history in the making with the first pro team in Scandinavia. I will be relentless in my pursuit to make the team reach its full potential and be the best teammate I can."

uerZ5bXUdmQDAjhLJZ1U.title: Nordic Storm Deltager i ELF North Division i 2025-sæsonen
uerZ5bXUdmQDAjhLJZ1U.titleEn: Nordic Storm Joins ELF North Division for 2025 Season

uerZ5bXUdmQDAjhLJZ1U.descriptionEn: Nordic Storm enters the ELF North Division in 2025 with high ambitions and exciting rivalries ahead.

parts.html: 2025-sæsonen i European League of Football (ELF) bliver en milepæl for dansk og svensk football, når det København-baserede Nordic Storm gør sin debut i ligaen. Placeringen i North Division betyder, at Storm skal konkurrere mod nogle af ligaens mest frygtindgydende hold: de regerende mestre Rhein Fire, Berlin Thunder og Hamburg Sea Devils.

Store rivaliseringer

Kampene i North Division tegner til at blive nogle af de mest spændende i 2025 ELF-sæsonen. Rhein Fire, der bygger på en stærk mesterskabshistorik, vil forsøge at forsvare deres titel mod hård konkurrence. Samtidig er Berlin Thunder og Hamburg Sea Devils opsatte på at vælte mestrene af tronen og skifte magtforholdene i Tyskland.

For Nordic Storm er muligheden for at møde så stærke modstandere i debut-sæsonen både en udfordring og en inspiration. Fans kan se frem til elektriske kampe, især mod Rhein Fire, hvor Jadrian Clark, Glen Toonga og Joachim Christensen vil forsøge at bevise deres værd mod deres tidligere holdkammerater.

En Ny Udfordrer

Når 2025-sæsonen nærmer sig, vil alle øjne være rettet mod Storm for at se, hvordan denne nye udfordrer klarer sig mod nogle af Europas bedste hold. Med profilerede signinger, en passioneret fanbase og en stærk konkurrenceånd er Nordic Storm klar til at sætte deres præg på ELF – og mere til.

Hold dig opdateret, mens holdet gør sig klar til deres første sæson. Én ting er sikkert: København er klar til at bringe stormen til ELF North Division.

partsEn.html: The 2025 European League of Football (ELF) season will mark a significant milestone for Danish and Swedish football as the Copenhagen-based Nordic Storm makes its league debut. Placed in the North Division, the Storm will compete against some of the league's most formidable teams: the reigning back-to-back champions Rhein Fire, the Berlin Thunder, and the Hamburg Sea Devils.

Rivalries to Watch

The North Division matchups are shaping up to be some of the most exciting in the 2025 ELF season. The Rhein Fire, led by their championship-winning pedigree, will look to defend their crown against tough competition. Meanwhile, the Berlin Thunder and Hamburg Sea Devils are eager to dethrone the champions and shift the balance of power in Germany.

For Nordic Storm, the opportunity to face such high-caliber opponents in their debut season is both a challenge and an inspiration. Fans can expect electrifying games, particularly against Rhein Fire, where Jadrian Clark, Glen Toonga and Joachim Christensen will look to prove themselves against their former teammates.

A New Contender

As the 2025 season approaches, all eyes will be on the Storm to see how this new contender fares against some of Europe’s best. With high-profile signings, a passionate fan base, and a competitive spirit, Nordic Storm is poised to make their mark in the ELF and beyond.

Stay tuned for updates as the team gears up for their first season. One thing is certain: Copenhagen is ready to bring the storm to the ELF North Division.
